data.title: HealthCare Device Integration Pipeline
description: 1. Design, Develop, and maintain ETL pipelines to extract data from various sources and transform it according to business rules, and load it into target database using tools such as Azure data Factory
2. Design, implement and deploy azure solutions, leveraging services like azure functions, Azure storage, Azure SQL Database.
3. Implement CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins to automate build, and deployment process for delivery
4. Developed serverless azure functions based on Time and HTTP triggers for processing of records
5. Worked in agile environment, participate in sprint planning, and contribute to the development and delivery of user stories and project milestones.
6. Collaborate with cross functional teams, participate in code reviews, and maintain documentation for code , system architecture and deployment process.

data.title: Flask API and Development
description: 1. Developed and maintained a Flask-based API to handle healthcare organization data on the Azure cloud platform.
2. Implemented endpoints for creating, updating, and retrieving organization data using HTTP requests (POST, PUT, GET).
3. Containerization of the API is carried out using Docker, and management of Docker images is through the Azure Container Registry.
4. Containerization of the API is carried out using Docker, and management of Docker images is through the Azure Container Registry.
